meanings.definition: A connection or link between electronic devices.
meanings.sent1: I need a hookup to connect my phone to the speaker.
meanings.sent2: The hookup between the computer and the printer is not working.
meanings.sent3: The hookup between the TV and the game console was playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: The hookup between the router and the modem is the lifeline of our internet connection.
meanings.sent5: Make sure the hookup between the headphones and the music player is secure for clear sound.

meanings.sent1: She regretted the hookup with a stranger at the party.
meanings.sent2: Their hookup was just a one-time thing.
meanings.sent3: The awkward hookup between the two characters in the movie made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The hookup between the main characters added an unexpected twist to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The steamy hookup in the romance novel left readers blushing.
